name: Werehouse IIIX
description: The city is under full riot and as you run to escape the crowd you come across an open warehouse door, enter the warehouse intending to find a place to hide only to discover that this new state of the art facility is loaded with bugs and other nasty things.  Complete the objectives working to find a way to escape Werehouse IIIX.  Built during Buffalo Game Space's Gam Jam XV.  Theme "Mistakes were made".
